title: Bubble
writer: Gen Urobuchi, Renji Ooki, Naoko Satou
short_cast: Jun Shison, Riria, Mamoru Miyano, Yuki Kaji, Tasuku Hatanaka, Alice Hirose, Sayaka Sembongi, Marina Inoue, Shinichiro Miki

desc: In an abandoned Tokyo overrun by bubbles and gravitational abnormalities, one gifted young man has a fateful meeting with a mysterious girl.
